SELECT urp.`permission_id`, urp.`action`, urp.`active`, up.`name` FROM `upms_role_permission` urp LEFT JOIN `upms_permission` up ON up.`permission_id` = urp.`permission_id` INNER JOIN `upms_system` us ON up.`system_id` = us.`system_id` WHERE 1=1 AND up.`type` = 2 AND urp.`role_id` = #{role_id}
AND us.`name` = #{system_name}
